title: FS T206 Snodgrass Batting SGC 50 - SOLD
author: Cy2009

posts.post_title: FS T206 Snodgrass Batting SGC 50 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
The card is SOLD. Thanks for looking.

Hi,

I have for sale a 1910 T206 Fred Snodgrass Batting card.  The card is graded SGC 50 VG-Ex.

It has a nice picture, with honest wear on the corners. This is a pretty nice card. Take a look for yourself.

[URL="http://www.cyscards.com/t206/06-442.html"][IMG]http://www.cyscards.com/t206/picsb/06-442t.jpg[/IMG]

Click on the picture to view a larger picture of the front and back.[/URL]

Just a note about me, I used to post a lot more on the Net 54 board a few years back. 
I've moved away from collecting but now I am selling some of my remaining cards. I have had many dealings on this board. 
I wanted to make this comment because I haven't been on this board that much in a while.

Thanks for looking.

Cy
